PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CurtainWallCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcCurtainWall.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1')

PropertyDef.Name: AcousticRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Acoustic rating for this object. It is giving according to the national building code. It indicates the sound transmission resistance of this object by an index ration (instead of providing full sound absorbtion values).

PropertyDef.Name: FireRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating given according to the national fire safety classification.

PropertyDef.Name: Combustible
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the object is made from combustible material (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: SurfaceSpreadOfFlame
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication on how the flames spread around the surface, It is given according to the national building code that governs the fire behaviour for materials.

PropertyDef.Name: ThermalTransmittance
PropertyDef.Definition: Thermal transmittance coefficient (U-Value) of a material. Here the total thermal transmittance coefficient through the wall (including all materials).

PropertyDef.Name: IsExternal
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external element and faces the outside of the building.
